overview:
MAXCOM TECHNOLOGIES are a market leader in IP-CCTV cameras, Digital Video Recorders (DVR) and Network Video Recorders (NVR), Access Control, Biometric Time Attendance, Intrusion Security Alarm systems. Maxcom is Dubai Police approved to supply, install and maintain Security systems. The company’s main area of specialty is Remote Monitoring, creating a central management system to view and control their multiple locations simultaneously.

Maxcom products: CCTV cameras systems with the most advanced features like Night Vision and Day / Night switching, Ultra High Resolution Cameras exceeding 600 TV lines, Wide Dynamic Range; Digital Video Recorders (DVR); Hybrid/ Network Video Recorders (NVR); IP Camera Systems; Security alarm (wired and wireless).

Web-site: www.maxcom.ae
